jd_information.description: - Must have experience of minimum 2-3 years working in sales force marketing cloud platform.- Should have user interface marketing cloud experience.- Should be able to send email automation, create journey builder.- Have knowledge of Implementation of data base between CRM and marketing cloud.- Knowledge of digital marketing, social marketing, google analytics and web analytics.-Knowledge of content marketing, conversion and customer retention.-Web design/development technical skills and experience advantageous.-Excellent oral and written communication skills.** Note : Please do not apply if you do not have sales force marketing cloud platform experience.
